Landscape Module¶

This is the landscape module. The file contains a Environment-class, and subclasses of Environment.

class biosim.landscape.Desert[source]¶

Bases: biosim.landscape.Environments

This is the subclass “Desert”, which is a subclass of Environments. Animals may live here.

The class inherits reset_food from Environments, and defines parameters.

environment_parameter = {'f_max': 0}¶
class biosim.landscape.Environments[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the main class for the different Environments on the island. The currently implemented environments are the following: - Lowlands; - Highlands; - Desert; - Water. This class assumes that the environments are habitable. If this is not the case, it will be updated in the subclass.

Each subclass may have food available.

environment_parameter = None¶
habitable = True¶
reset_food()[source]¶

Resets the food for the environment when called.

class biosim.landscape.Highlands[source]¶

Bases: biosim.landscape.Environments

This is the subclass “Highlands”, which is a subclass of Environments. Animals may live and feed here. The default food amount for each year is 300.

The class inherits reset_food from Environments, and defines parameters.

environment_parameter = {'f_max': 300}¶
classmethod set_highland_params(new_params=None)[source]¶

Method that allows the user to change the default parameter in highland.

class biosim.landscape.Lowlands[source]¶

Bases: biosim.landscape.Environments

This is the subclass “Lowlands”, which is a subclass of Environments. Animals may live and feed here. The default food amount for each year is 800.

The class inherits reset_food from Environments, and defines parameters.

environment_parameter = {'f_max': 800}¶
classmethod set_lowlands_params(new_params=None)[source]¶

Method that allows the user to change the default parameter in lowland.

class biosim.landscape.Water[source]¶

Bases: biosim.landscape.Environments

This is the subclass “Water”, which is a subclass of Environments. Animals cannot live here.

This is a subclass of Environments.

environment_parameter = {'f_max': 0}¶
